intro_description: DACO GROUP is one of the fastest growing development companies with 15 years of experience in the market.
DACO GROUP is one of the fastest growing: DACO GROUP is one of the fastest growing development companies with 15 years of experience in the market. The company's activity is aimed at creating unique residential complexes, distinguished by their innovation, smart approach and high quality.
DACO GROUP pays special attention to bot: DACO GROUP pays special attention to both construction issues and work with clients, providing an individual approach and thorough advice when choosing an apartment or business property. Our main task is not only in high-quality construction and development of social infrastructure, but also in timely settlement and after-sales service.
